entry.title: Set of 2 Horse Blanket Surcingle Repair for Blankets Hardware Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Blanket Accessories
Price: 5.99

Use this handy kit to repair your broken blanket straps. The surcingle replacement buckle and slider can replace the hardware on any belly surcingle straps. These can be used on any brand such as weatherbeeta, and weight blankets including lightweight and heavyweight. These are a great alternative to buying brand new blankets and turnouts. They are great for leg straps too!
  • QUANTITY- Sold in lot of 2 (3 pieces per lot)
  • SIZING- 2" Buckle and Sliders
  • USAGES - Great for belly surcingles on blankets

entry.title: Removable Adjustable Elastic Leg Straps Pair for Horse Blankets & Sheets
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Blanket Accessories
Price: 10.99

No need to give away that old broken blanket. These adjustable leg straps are ready to take the place of those old missing or broken ones. These leg straps feature an unique loop design that helps improve safety and reduces injury.
  • Adjustable 1" webbing with snaps on one end
  • One size fits all
  • Includes two replacement leg straps

entry.title: Derby Originals Nordic-Tough 1200D All Season Reflective Waterproof Mini Horse Pony Turnout Sheet with 2 Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Turnout Sheets
Price: 64.99 - 79.99 (30 variants)

  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE'S COMFORT IN MIND - this premium horse sheet by Derby Originals was meticulously designed here in the USA to be comfortable for your horse to wear. This sturdy sheet is made from durable and high quality materials.
  • INNOVATIVE, MODERN BLANKET DESIGN - our Nordic-Tough reflective blanket series is new for 2019 and boasts new features such as quick-clip double chest buckles, adjust-to-fit neck straps, a safety reflective bodied design, contoured fit, 210T lining, and more.
  • DESIGNED FOR BOTH INDOOR AND OUTDOOR USE - this sturdy turnout sheet was designed to be comfortable to wear both indoors and out. Our durable ripstop design means this sheet is great for use out in the pasture and group turnout.
  • DESIGNED FOR ALL-SEASON USE — this rain sheet was designed to protect your horse from the elements and is ideal for keeping your horse dry in wet or snowy weather, or using in cool weather for added warmth.
  • 2 YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY - this product is eligible for a 2 year warranty that protects against manufacturing defects. Normal wear and tear and accidents are not covered. To register your product warranty, visit Derby Originals' website.

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.

entry.title: Derby Originals Nordic-Tough 600D Medium Weight Reflective Waterproof Winter Mini Horse Pony Turnout Blanket 200g with 1 Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Turnout Blankets
Price: 64.99 - 79.99 (60 variants)

 

DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE'S COMFORT IN MIND - this premium horse blanket by Derby Originals was meticulously designed here in the USA to be comfortable for your horse to wear. This sturdy blanket is made from durable and high quality materials.

INNOVATIVE, MODERN BLANKET DESIGN - our Nordic-Tough reflective blanket series is new for 2019 and boasts new features such as quick-clip double chest buckles, adjust-to-fit neck straps, a safety reflective bodied design, contoured fit, and more.

DESIGNED FOR BOTH INDOOR AND OUTDOOR USE - this sturdy turnout blanket was designed to be comfortable to wear both indoors and out. Our durable ripstop design means this blanket is great for use out in the pasture and group turnout.

DURABLE TRIPLE LAYER DESIGN - this blanket features a soft but strong 210T inner lining, 200g of polyfil insulation that provides extra warmth without overheating, and a sturdy 600D nylon exterior that is ripstop, breathable, and waterproof.

1 YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY - this product is eligible for a 1 year warranty that protects against manufacturing defects. Normal wear and tear and accidents are not covered. To register your product warranty, visit Derby Originals' website.

 

Care Instructions

 

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.

entry.title: Derby Originals Arctic Purple Plaid 1200D Heavy Weight Waterproof Winter Horse Turnout Blanket 300g with 2 Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Turnout Blankets
Price: 119.99 - 124.99 (14 variants)

 

Our Extreme Elements Series 1200D Ripstop Waterproof Nylon Heavyweight Horse Turnout Blanket is one of our top-selling blankets and was designed to be a long-lasting, durable, and comfortable turnout blanket for use in any weather, no matter how extreme! With a cozy 300g of polyfil and a super tough ripstop construction, this blanket was built to last in even the coldest climates, and on the most destructive horses.

DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE'S COMFORT IN MIND - this premium horse blanket by Derby Originals was meticulously designed here in the USA to be comfortable for your horse to wear. This sturdy blanket is made from durable and high quality materials.

THE PERFECT EVERYDAY BLANKET - this versatile blanket was designed to work for a wide variety of horses and be the perfect every-day blanket for chilly autumn, winter, and spring weather and for use in both dry and wet conditions.

DESIGNED FOR BOTH INDOOR AND OUTDOOR USE - this sturdy turnout blanket was designed to be comfortable to wear both indoors and out. Our durable ripstop design means this blanket is great for use out in the pasture and group turnout.

DURABLE TRIPLE LAYER DESIGN - this blanket features a soft but strong 210T inner lining, 300g of polyfil insulation that provides extra warmth without overheating, and a sturdy 1200D nylon exterior that is ripstop, breathable, and waterproof.

2 YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY - this product is eligible for a 2 year warranty that protects against manufacturing defects. Normal wear and tear and accidents are not covered. To register your product warranty, visit Derby Originals' website.

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.

entry.title: Derby Originals Extreme Elements 1200D Heavy Weight Waterproof Winter Horse Turnout Blanket 400g with 2 Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Turnout Blankets
Price: 104.99 - 129.99 (18 variants)

 

Our Extreme Elements Collection 1200D Ballistic Nylon Triple Gusset Heavyweight Waterproof Horse Turnout Blanket with Removable Hood was designed to be the best blanket for any weather situation, no matter how extreme. This blanket has 400g of polyfill to cut any chance of drafts from cold winds and keep your horse cozy and warm in sub-zero temperatures. Our blanket also features a triple side gusset design to give your horse a maximum freedom of movement. This blanket has a ballistic nylon outer shell, which is our strongest and most tear, cut, and damage resistant blanket material. This blanket also comes with a removable hood to protect your horse’s neck from freezing weather and snow.

DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE'S COMFORT IN MIND - this premium horse blanket by Derby Originals was meticulously designed here in the USA to be comfortable for your horse to wear. This sturdy blanket is made from durable and high quality materials.

THE PERFECT WINTER BLANKET - this blanket is the perfect winter blanket for almost any horse and climate due to it’s highly adjustable and classic features, hefty 400g of Polyfil, sturdy ripstop nylon shell, and included matching hood.

DESIGNED FOR BOTH INDOOR AND OUTDOOR USE - this sturdy turnout blanket was designed to be comfortable to wear both indoors and out. Our durable ripstop design means this blanket is great for use out in the pasture and group turnout.

BALLISTIC NYLON CONSTRUCTION - this is our strongest blanket on the market, made of a very high denier 1080D nylon thread that is densely woven into a 2x2 basket weave, which makes this blanket incredibly tough and cut, tear, or damage resistant.

2 YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY - this product is eligible for a 2 year warranty that protects against manufacturing defects. Normal wear and tear and accidents are not covered. To register your product warranty, visit Derby Originals' website.

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.


Waterproof Construction: this blanket is made from a waterproof nylon material covered in a  Teflon coating. These blankets are guaranteed to be fully waterproof unless the blanket is ripped/torn, or the Teflon coating is damaged through improper washing or cleaning, or abuse of the blanket.

Sizing Information

This turnout blanket is sized in the same manner that you will size any other horse blanket: by measuring, in inches, from the center of your horse’s chest to the end of your horse’s rump. If your horse is in-between sizes, we recommend sizing up to the closest available size. 

Product Information

Blanket Style: Turnout Blanket

Waterproof: Yes

Breathable: Yes

Weight: Heavyweight

Material: Nylon

Denier: 1200 Ballistic Weave

Ripstop: Yes

Tail Cover: Yes

Wither Protector: Yes

Shoulder Gussets: Yes

Polyfill: 300g

Inner Lining: 210T Nylon

Belly Closure: Crossed Surcingles

Leg Straps: Crossed Elastic

Colors Available: Black with Black Trim, Royal Blue with Black Trim

Sizes Available: 72”, 75”, 78”, and 81”
